Description of incident: An external hard drive has gone missing. Approximately 35,000 current and former members of the Arkansas Army National Guard are affected by the loss. The drive included names, Social Security numbers and other personal information which potentially places the affected soldiers at risk for identity theft.UPDATE (5/18/10): The external hard drive containing personal information on over 32,000 current and former Arkansas Guardsmen that was reported missing on February 22 has now been recovered and destroyed. The drive was reported missing by an Arkansas Soldier who used the device as a personal backup of his work related information. This included a copy of the Guard's personnel database which contained personal information on all Soldiers who have served in the Arkansas Army National Guard since 1991.
